section.p: She screams in terror and, with a puff of smoke, suddenly changes into a small, brightly coloured butterfly that flutters away on the breeze. You chase after her, but she flies up out of sight. You catch a tiny titter of laughter wafting towards you on the wind.

Note you have a
, CHARISMA -2. Reduce your CHARISMA by two until you can find a way to lift the curse. .
